titleStmt.title: A letter of resolution to six quæres, of present use in the Church of England. By Henry Hammond D.D.
titleStmt.author: Hammond, Henry, 1605-1660.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by J. Flesher for R. Royston at the Angel in Ivy-lane,

notesStmt.note: Thomason received his copy in November 1652.
Annotation on Thomason copy: "Nou. 1st 1652"; 3 in imprint date crossed through.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
With three pages of advertisements at end.
